tns:appointmentResult.tns:anamnesis: The patient has had recurring headaches for the past 5 years
tns:appointmentResult.tns:objectively: The patient reports frequent dizziness and sensitivity to light
tns:appointmentResult.tns:recommendations: Increase hydration and rest during episodes
tns:appointmentResult.tns:actions: Prescribed medication and referred to a neurologist
tns:appointmentResult.tns:conclusion: Further investigation required if symptoms persist
